TITLE: Cramer says investors shouldn't rule out another strong stock rally in 2022 after last year's massive gains
SUMMARY: "Sometimes you have to suspend your short-term skepticism to make long-term money," CNBC's Jim Cramer said after the first trading day of 2021.

TITLE: Jim Cramer's 2022 outlook for the S&P 500's 10 biggest winners last year
SUMMARY: The "Mad Money" host said he believes many of the S&P 500's biggest winners in 2021 may keep thriving this year.

SUMMARY: The "Mad Money" host said poor 2021 performers such as Penn National and Global Payments are likely to keep struggling this year.

TITLE: Cramer's lightning round: Bank of America is an 'incredibly cheap stock'

TITLE: Jim Cramer says Okta versus Deere is the best way to understand the current stock market
SUMMARY: "The playbook says you have to go with more tangible companies that make real things and generate real profits," the "Mad Money" host said.

TITLE: Bed Bath & Beyond CEO says losing $100 million in Q3 sales hurts but signals strong shopper demand
SUMMARY: "It does show that the brand is alive and well and that we have demand. That we can't meet it absolutely kills me," Bed Bath & Beyond CEO Mark Tritton said.

TITLE: Conagra Brands CEO says inflation won't go away even after Covid omicron wave passes
SUMMARY: "It's not quite that simple. I don't think if omicron goes away it immediately solves inflation," Conagra Brands CEO Sean Connolly told CNBC's Jim Cramer.
